ygData.subject: 14 Days left!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all. I got 14 days left till I move on campus. Awesome huh? Anyway, started going about getting the stuff to up-grade my comp. I have the sound card, and
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all. I got 14 days left till I move on campus. Awesome huh?
Anyway, started going about getting the stuff to up-grade my comp. I
have the sound card, and SOL, so now all's I need is the vid card and
some memory. I asked my cousin (he's a comp wiz. works for Compac
too) and he gave me the names of some stores that I can bug here in
Houston. Soooo...I figure end of next month? I should be playing
again. Ok so here is the question I have for up-grading the comp.
Will just the mem, vid and sound up-grade be enough if I have a pen
2? (at this time I can only afford to up-grade that stuff versus a
whole new mother board.) The Raven P.S. I'm thinking Rayvin for a
name. Sound ok?
